plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits munch on me!
🌱 I'm a vegetable!
🥗 You can eat me in a salad!

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and bright colors. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I attract buzzing friends!
💐 You can give me as a gift!
🌸 I'm pretty and grow in gardens!

plant.question: I am big and tall, with lots of leaves and a strong trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I'm made of wood!
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me!
🌳 I give shade on a sunny day!

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me as a snack. Sometimes I'm in pickles! What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm a yummy vegetable!
🥪 I go great in sandwiches!
🥗 You can find me in salads or made into pickles!

plant.question: I am round and red, and grow on a vine. You can make sauce with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I'm often used to make pasta sauce!
🔴 I'm a juicy fruit!
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow!

plant.question: I grow in the water and have big, flat leaves. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs love to hop on me!
🌊 I float on the water's surface.
🌿 I'm a type of plant with broad leaves.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, and I make acorns. Squirrels like to bury them. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I make nuts!
🐿️ Squirrels love me!
🌳 I'm a type of tree!

plant.question: I have a prickly outside, but I am sweet and juicy inside. I grow in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I live in a dry, hot place!
🏜️ I am found in the desert.
💚 I am a plant that is prickly.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows tall. You can make bread and cereal from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a tall grass!
🍞 You can make toast with me!
🌻 I am related to the plant that produces flour!

plant.question: I have green needles instead of leaves and stay green all year round. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I'm used during a special holiday!
🌟 I have pointy needles instead of leaves.
🎁 People put presents under me!

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect nectar from flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet to eat.
🐝 I say 'Bzzzzzz'!

bug.question: I am green or brown and jump really high. You might find me in the grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🌱 I eat plants.
🦵 I use my strong legs to hop!

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots help me hide.
🍎 I eat tiny bugs called aphids.
🟢 People like to see me in their gardens.

bug.question: I march in lines and work together to carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
🪨 I can lift things much heavier than myself.
🧺 We often carry crumbs to our home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and turn into something beautiful that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have colorful wings.
🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I am young.
🌸 I visit flowers to drink nectar.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch other bugs for food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is very intricate
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 Smaller bugs get stuck to me.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I am a beetle.
🌙 You can see me best at night.
✨ I use my light to attract a friend.

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs and I crawl on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs!
🪵 I live in dark, damp places.
🍂 I like to hide under rocks and leaves.

bug.question: I can swim, fly, and have big eyes. I like to live near ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ I have amazing eyesight.
🏞️ I like to live near rivers and streams as well as ponds.
🦟 I eat other bugs, especially mosquitoes.

bug.question: I look like a stick to help me hide from birds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm very good at camouflage.
🍃 I like to live on trees.
🚶 I am long and thin.
